name: Dusk;Twilight Chapter 01
description:
Dusk;Twilight is a short Action-Platformer with anime inspired graphics.

The main character. Alba, is an ordinary human in this world overflowing with battles.His beloved partner, Hoshi, happens to be the world's most powerful threat, The Necromancer. Now that the two of them are in the center of the attentions, what kind of fate will they meet.

CONTROLS:

You will need a keyboard or a Xbox 360 Controller.in order to play the game.

This game requires a graphic card that supports DirectX9.

Only Available for Windows.

Game made by Alba.

Illustrations by Black.
